Package com.rapidminer.belt.util

Class Mapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rapidminer.belt.util.Mapping
  • public final class Mapping
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for mapping methods.
    Author:
    Gisa Schaefer

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public static double[] apply​(double[] data,
                             int[] mapping)
        Applies the given mapping to the given data set creating a deep copy. When the mapping is out of range, the new value will be Double.NaN.
        Parameters:
        data - the source data
        mapping - the index mapping to apply
        Returns:
        the remapped deep copy

      • apply

        public static long[] apply​(long[] data,
                           int[] mapping,
                           long outOfRange)
        Applies the given mapping to the given data set creating a deep copy.
        Parameters:
        data - the source data
        mapping - the index mapping to apply
        outOfRange - the value to use when the mapping is out of range of the data
        Returns:
        the remapped deep copy

      • apply

        public static int[] apply​(int[] data,
                          int[] mapping)
        Applies the given mapping to the given data set creating a deep copy. When the mapping is out of range, the new value will be 0.
        Parameters:
        data - the source data
        mapping - the index mapping to apply
        Returns:
        the remapped deep copy

      • apply

        public static short[] apply​(short[] data,
                            int[] mapping)
        Applies the given mapping to the given data set creating a deep copy. When the mapping is out of range, the new value will be 0.
        Parameters:
        data - the source data
        mapping - the index mapping to apply
        Returns:
        the remapped deep copy

      • apply

        public static IntegerFormats.PackedIntegers apply​(IntegerFormats.PackedIntegers data,
                                                  int[] mapping)
        Applies the given mapping to the given data set creating a deep copy. When the mapping is out of range, the new value will be 0.
        Parameters:
        data - the source data
        mapping - the index mapping to apply
        Returns:
        the remapped deep copy

      • apply

        public static java.lang.Object[] apply​(java.lang.Object[] data,
                                       int[] mapping)
        Applies the given mapping to the given data set creating a deep copy. When the mapping is out of range, the new value will be null.
        Parameters:
        data - the source data
        mapping - the index mapping to apply
        Returns:
        the remapped deep copy

      • merge

        public static int[] merge​(int[] f,
                          int[] g)
        Merges (composes) the given mappings f: X -> Y and g: Y -> Z into a single mapping h: X -> Z. When the mapping is out of range, the new value will be MISSING.
        Parameters:
        f - the first mapping
        g - the second mapping
        Returns:
        the merged mapping
